channel.description: Recent content in music on AMKS

item.title: Beatlemania: Please Please Me
item.description: I love music. And I’m also a music noob. I think it’s high time to change that. Starting, of course, with the best music band of all time. Let’s start from the beginning – their first album, Please Please Me. Here’s my unfiltered thoughts, straight from my twitter. “I’m Just Here For Some Recommendations” And that’s completely cool! Here’s my top songs from this album: Love Me Do, Please Please Me, I Saw Her Standing There, Anna, and Twist And Shout.
